001import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;
002import java.awt.event.ActionListener;
003import javax.swing.JDialog;
004import javax.swing.JPanel;
005import javax.swing.JLabel;
006import java.awt.Color;
007import java.util.ArrayList;
008import java.awt.BorderLayout;
009
010/**
011 * Décrivez votre classe TradeButton ici.
012 *
013 * @author (votre nom)
014 * @version (un numéro de version ou une date)
015 */
016public class InfoButton extends PopupButton implements ActionListener {
017    private UserInterface aUI;
018    private MC aMC;
019    
020    private JDialog aDialog;
021    private JPanel aMainPanel;
022    private JPanel aButtonPanel;
023    private JPanel aPNJPanel;
024    private JPanel aPNJLabelPanel;
025    private JPanel aPNJCenterPanel;
026    private JPanel aSelfPanel;
027    private JPanel aSelfCenterPanel;
028    
029    private JLabel aPNJLabel;
030    private JLabel aTarget;
031    
032    private Color aBGColor;
033    private Color aTextColor;
034    private Color aHoverBGColor;
035    private Color aHoverTextColor;
036    
037    private ArrayList<String> aItems;
038
039    private CancelButton aCancelButton;
040    
041    public InfoButton(final String pText, final UserInterface pUI) {
042        super(pText);
043        this.aUI = pUI;
044        this.aMC = this.aUI.getGE().getMC();
045        
046        this.aBGColor = new Color(56, 51, 51);
047        this.aTextColor = new Color(245, 240, 240);
048        this.aHoverBGColor = new Color(45, 40, 40);
049        this.aHoverTextColor = new Color(155, 150, 150);
050        
051        this.aPNJLabel = new JLabel("Personnages :");
052        this.aPNJLabel.setForeground(Color.white);
053        
054        this.aItems = new ArrayList<String>();
055        
056        this.addActionListener(this);
057    }
058    
059    @Override
060    public void actionPerformed(final ActionEvent pE) {
061        PopupButton.COMMAND_WORD = this.getText();
062        this.createDialog();
063    }
064    
065    private void createDialog() {
066        this.setPossibleItems();
067        
068        this.aDialog = new JDialog(this.aUI.getFrame(), JDialog.ModalityType.APPLICATION_MODAL);
069        this.aDialog.setLayout(new BorderLayout());
070        
071        this.aMainPanel = new JPanel();
072        this.aMainPanel.setLayout(new BorderLayout());
073        this.aMainPanel.setBackground(new Color(20, 0, 0));
074        
075        // Panel des boutons confirmer et annuler
076        this.aButtonPanel = new JPanel();
077        this.aButtonPanel.setBackground(this.aBGColor);
078        
079        // panel avec les boutons des items
080        this.aPNJPanel = new JPanel();
081        this.aPNJPanel.setLayout(new BorderLayout());
082        this.aPNJPanel.setBackground(new Color(4, 51, 86));
083        
084        // panel pour le label Item
085        this.aPNJLabelPanel = new JPanel();
086        this.aPNJLabelPanel.add(this.aPNJLabel);
087        this.aPNJLabelPanel.setBackground(new Color(4, 51, 86));
088        
089        this.aPNJPanel.add(this.aPNJLabelPanel, BorderLayout.NORTH);
090        
091        //
092        this.aSelfPanel = new JPanel();
093        this.aSelfPanel.setBackground(new Color(23, 26, 29));
094        
095        this.aSelfPanel.add(new TargetButton("Moi", this.aUI, this.aDialog));
096    
097        this.aCancelButton = new CancelButton("Annuler", this.aDialog, this.aUI);
098        
099        this.aButtonPanel.add(this.aCancelButton);
100        
101        this.aMainPanel.add(this.aSelfPanel, BorderLayout.NORTH);
102        this.aMainPanel.add(this.aPNJPanel, BorderLayout.CENTER);
103        this.aMainPanel.add(this.aButtonPanel, BorderLayout.SOUTH);
104        
105        this.aPNJCenterPanel = new JPanel();
106        this.aSelfCenterPanel = new JPanel();
107        
108        this.addButtons();
109        
110        this.aDialog.add(aMainPanel, BorderLayout.CENTER);
111        this.aDialog.setSize(500, 300);
112        this.aDialog.setUndecorated(true);
113        this.aDialog.setLocationRelativeTo(null);
114        
115        this.aDialog.setVisible(true);
116    }
117    
118    private void addButtons() {
119        for(String vItemName : this.aItems) {
120            this.aPNJCenterPanel.add(new TargetButton(vItemName, this.aUI, this.aDialog));
121        }
122        this.aPNJPanel.add(this.aPNJCenterPanel, BorderLayout.CENTER);
123    }
124    
125    private void setPossibleItems() {
126        this.aItems.clear();
127        for(String vItemName : GameEngine.GAME_PNJ.keySet()) {
128            if(!this.aItems.contains(vItemName))
129                this.aItems.add(vItemName);
130        }
131    }
132}
